p: The plot for the estimated value of the ( R 0) obtained by the above‐mentioned studies is shown in Figure 4. The plot shows a high reproductive number at the beginning of the outbreak in China with the maximum peak in mid‐January 2020. However, with passage of time, social distancing, self‐quarantine, health care measures, and governmental actions had a substantial effect in containing the outbreak which is evident from the estimates of the ( R 0 ) in the months of February and March, 2020.
